==Content==
{{Dialogue Start}}
===Introduction===
:'''"Yumemizuki's Cozy Corner":''' "Worries and sorrow, anxiety and fear... Negative emotions can lurk deep within our consciousness, seeping out to disturb our dreams time and time again..."
:'''"Yumemizuki's Cozy Corner":''' "Why not take a break from your delightful vacation to soothe any lingering worries and find some inner peace..."
:'''"Yumemizuki's Cozy Corner":''' "Yumemizuki's Cozy Corner is here to help. The special psychotherapy services offered by our dream-eating [[Yumekui-Baku|baku]] can help dispel the shadows in your soul."
:'''"Yumemizuki's Cozy Corner":''' "What's more, the Natlan branch of the [[Aisa Bathhouse]] is already under construction. We hope to welcome you soon!"
